solution_line_template: He knows {known_attendees} people are showing up and he’s hoping {hoped_attendees} more people will drop in for a total of {known_attendees}+{hoped_attendees} = <<{known_attendees}+{hoped_attendees}={total_expected_people}>>{total_expected_people} people

He’s made {extravagant_bags} extravagant gift bags and {average_bags} average bags for a total of {extravagant_bags}+{average_bags} = <<{extravagant_bags}+{average_bags}={total_bags_made}>>{total_bags_made} bags

He hopes {total_expected_people} people will show up and has already made {total_bags_made} bags so he needs to make {total_expected_people}-{total_bags_made} = <<{total_expected_people}-{total_bags_made}={bags_needed}>>{bags_needed} more gift bags
